code:
sequenceDiagram participant C as Customer participant W as Web Frontend participant A as API Server participant D as Database participant S as Staff participant F as File Storage Note over C,F: Manual Payment Flow %% Start Payment C->>W: Click "Pay Now" W->>A: POST /payments/manual/start Note right of W: {IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker} A->>D: Create Payment record Note right of A: status: PENDING D-->>A: Payment created A-->>W: {IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode} W-->>C: Show payment instructions %% Upload Proof C->>W: Upload payment proof W->>A: POST /payments/manual/proof Note right of W: multipart/form-data
{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController} A->>F: Store proof file Note right of A: Validate file type, size F-->>A: File stored A->>D: Update Payment Note right of A: status: UNDER_REVIEW
proofUrl: file_path D-->>A: Payment updated A-->>W: {IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream} W-->>C: "Payment under review" %% Staff Review S->>W: Login to admin panel W->>A: GET /admin/payments/pending A->>D: Query pending payments D-->>A: Pending payments A-->>W: List of pending payments W-->>S: Show payment details & proof alt Payment Approved S->>W: Click "Approve" W->>A: POST /payments/manual/review Note right of W: {IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode} A->>D: Update Payment Note right of A: status: SUCCEEDED
reviewedAt: now(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) D-->>A: Payment updated A->>D: Update Order Note right of A: status: PAID
paidAt: now(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) D-->>A: Order updated A->>D: Create Delivery Note right of A: Generate token hash
status: PENDING D-->>A: Delivery created A-->>W: {IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode} W-->>S: "Payment approved" %% Notify Customer A->>D: Create Notification Note right of A: type: PAYMENT_APPROVED D-->>A: Notification created A-->>C: SSE: payment.status else Payment Rejected S->>W: Click "Reject" W->>A: POST /payments/manual/review Note right of W: {IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker} A->>D: Update Payment Note right of A: status: FAILED
reviewedAt: now(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) D-->>A: Payment updated A->>D: Update Order Note right of A: status: CANCELED
canceledAt: now(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) D-->>A: Order updated A-->>W: {IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic} W-->>S: "Payment rejected" %% Notify Customer A->>D: Create Notification Note right of A: type: PAYMENT_REJECTED D-->>A: Notification created A-->>C: SSE: payment.status end %% Customer Response C->>W: Check payment status W->>A: GET /orders/{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController} A->>D: Query order with payment D-->>A: Order data A-->>W: Order details W-->>C: Show updated status alt Payment Approved C->>W: Access delivery W->>A: POST /deliveries/reveal Note right of W: {IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController} A->>D: Verify token & update delivery Note right of A: revealsLeft: 0
revealedAt: now(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) D-->>A: Delivery updated A-->>W: {IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream} W-->>C: Show delivery content end
